projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive web application that visualizes popular sorting and searching algorithms in real-time. Built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for an engaging learning experience.
features: Multiple sorting algorithms (Bubble, Merge, Quick, Heap)
Interactive controls for speed and array size

projects.title: Chat With Multiple PDF's
projects.description: Built an AI-powered document analysis system enabling natural language queries across multiple PDF's documents using LangChain, FAISS, and OpenAI embeddings.
features: Upload and chat with multiple PDFs at once.
Get instant, context-aware answers using LLMs.
Uses vector embeddings for accurate text retrieval.
Clean React + Tailwind interface for smooth interaction.
Handles large files with secure upload and parsing.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed ML-based recommendation system using collaborative filtering, NLP preprocessing with NLTK, and cosine similarity for accurate movie matching.
features: Suggests movies based on user interests and history.
Uses content-based and collaborative filtering models.
Fetches real-time movie data via TMDb API.
Interactive UI built with React and Tailwind CSS.

achievements.title: 300+ LeetCode Problems Solved

achievements.title: Top 15% in College Programming Contest
achievements.description: Ranked among top performers in annual coding competition
